alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rock, Loup, southeastern Brown, northeastern Custer and Blaine Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Johnstown to 6 miles south of Dunning. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Taylor, Brewster, Long Pine, Newport, Rose, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Sybrant, Duff, Linscott, Horseshoe Bend Lake, Pony Lake, Almeria and Jones Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 122 and 198. Highway 20 between mile markers 240 and 272. Highway 2 between mile markers 243 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
